description:
Screen mirroring or screen casting allows you to mirror your mobile device's content to your TV screen.
Screen mirroring technology has changed substantially over recent years and the best method to mirror your screen will differ depending on the age, model and manufacturer of your smartphone, tablet and TV.
A lot of apps, such as Netflix and Youtube now have a screen mirroring function built in.
An amplifier and loudspeaker with Bluetooth wireless connectivity that is paired (pre-associated) with one or more smartphones, tablets, iPods or computers.

YouTube app then press the cast button and select your chromecast device select.
a video then press play and the video will play on your TV with chromecast you can control playback adjust. the volume or browse YouTube right from your device.
